models.name: shopping_mall_channels
models.description: Represents sales channels through which products are sold, such as websites, mobile apps, or physical kiosks. Channels organize sales under distinct business contexts and are configured separately to enable multi-channel commerce.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the channel. Used in URL paths and API endpoints.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Human-readable name of the sales channel.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the channel's purpose and characteristics.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the channel, e.g., active, inactive, pending.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel was logically deleted (soft delete).

models.name: shopping_mall_sections
models.description: Defines spatial product groupings similar to store corners, providing a way to organize products by physical or logical space within channels or the mall overall.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code for identifying the section.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Display name of the section.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional detailed description of the section.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the section in the system lifecycle.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the section was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp of soft deletion, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_mall_channel_categories
models.description: Maps hierarchical product categories to specific channels, enabling channel-customized product classifications and category structures.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged sales channel's {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged product category's {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel-category mapping was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the channel-category mapping was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the mapping was logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_attachments
models.description: Storage for all attachment files such as images, documents, or multimedia related to products, posts, and system resources. Supports metadata management and secure CDN distribution.

plainFields.name: file_name
plainFields.description: Stored file name including extension.

plainFields.name: file_url
plainFields.description: Publicly accessible URL pointing to the file location, typically via CDN.

plainFields.name: media_type
plainFields.description: MIME type of the file, e.g., image/png, application/pdf.

plainFields.name: file_size
plainFields.description: Size of the file in bytes.

plainFields.name: upload_ip
plainFields.description: IP address from which the file was uploaded.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the attachment was uploaded.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the attachment metadata was last modified.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the attachment was logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_guestusers
models.description: Guest user connections to the shopping mall, tracking non-member visitor information per session without authentication credentials. Used for anonymous browsing and session-based identification.

plainFields.name: ip_address
plainFields.description: IP address of the guest user connection.

plainFields.name: access_url
plainFields.description: The access URL the guest used to arrive at the mall.

plainFields.name: referrer
plainFields.description: HTTP referrer URL if available.

plainFields.name: user_agent
plainFields.description: User-Agent string from the guest browser.

plainFields.name: session_start_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session started.

plainFields.name: session_end_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest session ended or expired.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when guest record was logically deleted, if applicable.

models.name: shopping_mall_memberusers
models.description: Member user information representing registered customers with authentication credentials, profile data, and account status. Members can make purchases, manage orders, and participate in reviews.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Member's unique email address used for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for member authentication.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Nickname chosen by the member for display.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full name of the member for official documentation.

plainFields.name: phone_number
plainFields.description: Contact phone number of the member.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status or lifecycle state of the member account (e.g., active, suspended, closed).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Account creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when member account was logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_sellerusers
models.description: Seller user information representing members who have permissions to register products and manage sales. Sellers have extended profile and status fields reflecting their seller lifecycle state.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Seller's unique email address used for login and communication.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for seller authentication.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Nickname chosen by the seller for public display.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full name of the seller for official documentation.

plainFields.name: phone_number
plainFields.description: Contact phone number of the seller.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current lifecycle status of the seller account (e.g., active, pending, suspended).

plainFields.name: business_registration_number
plainFields.description: Official business registration number for the seller.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Account creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when seller account was logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_adminusers
models.description: System administrator user information with full access and elevated privileges to manage the shopping mall backend platform. Includes authentication credentials and status tracking.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Administrator's unique email address for login.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password for administrator authentication.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Display nickname for the administrator.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: Full legal name of the administrator.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current administrator account status (e.g., active, suspended).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Account creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when administrator account was logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_sales
models.description: Business entity representing products for sale in the shopping mall. This primary table stores essential product details, status, seller references, and pricing information. It relates to sales snapshots for history preservation and connects with categories and inventory management tables.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged channel's {\@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_section_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged section's {\@link shopping_mall_sections.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_seller_user_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged seller user's {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique product code for business identification.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Product status indicating lifecycle state such as active, paused, or discontinued.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Product name/title.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed product description.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Base price of the product.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_sale_snapshots
models.description: Snapshot table preserving historical states of shopping mall sales products for audit and rollback purposes. Each snapshot captures the entire product state at a point in time.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced product's {@link shopping_mall_sales.id}.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Captured product code at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Captured product status at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Captured product name/title at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Captured detailed product description at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Captured product base price at snapshot time.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp of the snapshot record.

models.name: shopping_mall_sale_units
models.description: Subsidiary entity representing units or components composing sales products. It supports composition and inventory management at a finer granularity.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged product {@link shopping_mall_sales.id}.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unit code used for identification under the product.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Unit name/title.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Detailed description of the unit.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_sale_unit_options
models.description: Subsidiary table representing options applied to specific sale units. It links unit option selections to sale units for detailed configuration.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_unit_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged sale unit {@link shopping_mall_sale_units.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_option_id
foreignFields.description: Applied sale option {@link shopping_mall_sale_options.id}.

plainFields.name: additional_price
plainFields.description: Additional price added by this option.

plainFields.name: stock_quantity
plainFields.description: Inventory stock quantity for this option unit.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_sale_options
models.description: Primary entity defining possible sale options applicable across products. Supports distinct option groups and value selections.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_option_group_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged option group {@link shopping_mall_sale_option_groups.id}.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifying the sale option.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Descriptive name of the sale option.

plainFields.name: type
plainFields.description: Type of the option (e.g., selection, boolean).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_sale_option_groups
models.description: Primary entity representing groups of sale options, enabling modular configuration of product option sets.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique code for the option group.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Name of the option group.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory
models.description: Primary entity managing inventory counts for product option combinations. Links sales products and option selections with stock data.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_id
foreignFields.description: Associated product {@link shopping_mall_sales.id}.

plainFields.name: option_combination_code
plainFields.description: Code representing the combination of options this inventory record applies to.

plainFields.name: stock_quantity
plainFields.description: Available stock quantity for this option combination.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Inventory record creation time.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp of the inventory record.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_categories
models.description: Primary business entity representing product categories within the shopping mall. Supports hierarchical categorization and active status management.

plainFields.name: code
plainFields.description: Unique category code.

plainFields.name: name
plainFields.description: Category name.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Category status such as active or inactive.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Optional category description.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_category_relations
models.description: Subsidiary junction table representing relationships among product categories forming a hierarchy or multiple parent-child links.

foreignFields.name: parent_shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Parent category {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: child_shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Child category {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Relation establishment timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_carts
models.description: Stores shopping cart sessions for customers, linked optionally to guest or member users. Supports cart lifecycle tracking via status, timestamps, and soft deletion.

foreignFields.name: guest_user_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged guest customer's shopping_mall_guestusers.id.

foreignFields.name: member_user_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged member customer's shopping_mall_memberusers.id.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Cart creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Cart last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current cart status, e.g. active, abandoned, expired.

models.name: shopping_mall_cart_items
models.description: Items that belong to a shopping cart, linked to product snapshots. Tracks quantity, pricing, status, timestamps, and soft deletion. Subsidiary to shopping_mall_carts.

foreignFields.name: shopping_cart_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged shopping cart's shopping_mall_carts.id.

foreignFields.name: shopping_sale_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced product snapshot shopping_mall_sale_snapshots.id.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity of the product in the cart item.

plainFields.name: unit_price
plainFields.description: Unit price of the product at the time of addition to cart.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Cart item creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Cart item last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp if item removed from cart.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the cart item, e.g. pending, ordered, cancelled.

models.name: shopping_mall_cart_item_options
models.description: Selected product option details for each cart item unit, linking option groups and options to enable precise cart item configuration. Subsidiary to cart items.

foreignFields.name: shopping_cart_item_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged shopping cart item shopping_mall_cart_items.id.

foreignFields.name: shopping_sale_option_group_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced option group shopping_mall_sale_option_groups.id.

foreignFields.name: shopping_sale_option_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced option shopping_mall_sale_options.id.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Option selection creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Option selection last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_orders
models.description: Represents customer orders within the shopping mall system, capturing order details and lifecycle. Each order is linked to a member user who placed it and to the channel and section through which it was made. The model tracks order status, payment status, total price, and timestamps. Supports soft deletion and audit trails via timestamps.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged member user who placed the order. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Sales channel through which the order was placed. {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_section_id
foreignFields.description: Section representing spatial grouping of the order. {@link shopping_mall_sections.id}.

plainFields.name: order_code
plainFields.description: Unique business identifier for the order.

plainFields.name: order_status
plainFields.description: Current status of the order such as 'pending', 'confirmed', 'shipped', 'delivered', 'cancelled'.

plainFields.name: payment_status
plainFields.description: Current status of payment such as 'pending', 'paid', 'cancelled'.

plainFields.name: total_price
plainFields.description: Total price of the order including all items and discounts.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for when the order was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for when the order was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp for soft deletion; null if not deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_order_items
models.description: Order items belonging to a specific shopping mall order. Each item references the product sale snapshot for consistency and tracks quantity, price, and status. This supporting entity enables detailed management of individual order contents, including returns and exchanges.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged order for this item. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced sale snapshot for the product in this order item. {@link shopping_mall_sale_snapshots.id}.

plainFields.name: quantity
plainFields.description: Quantity ordered of this product item.

plainFields.name: price
plainFields.description: Price per unit of the product item at order time.

plainFields.name: order_item_status
plainFields.description: Current status of this order item such as 'pending', 'shipped', 'returned'.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this order item was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this order item was last updated.

models.name: shopping_mall_payments
models.description: Payments applied for orders within the shopping mall system. This entity tracks payment status, associated order, payment method, amount, transaction details, and timestamps. Supports payment cancellation and asynchronous confirmation.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order to which this payment applies. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: payment_method
plainFields.description: Method of payment such as 'credit_card', 'bank_transfer', 'virtual_account'.

plainFields.name: payment_status
plainFields.description: Status of payment including 'pending', 'confirmed', 'cancelled', 'failed'.

plainFields.name: payment_amount
plainFields.description: Amount paid in this payment application.

plainFields.name: transaction_id
plainFields.description: External transaction reference identifier.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when payment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when payment was last updated.

plainFields.name: cancelled_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the payment was cancelled; null if not cancelled.

models.name: shopping_mall_deliveries
models.description: Delivery tracking information for orders including shipment statuses, delivery stages, expected dates, and timestamps. Supports partial and multi-stage shipments.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Order to which this delivery belongs. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}.

plainFields.name: delivery_status
plainFields.description: Current status of delivery such as 'preparing', 'shipping', 'delivered', 'exception'.

plainFields.name: delivery_stage
plainFields.description: Stage of delivery process including 'preparation', 'manufacturing', 'shipping', 'completed'.

plainFields.name: expected_delivery_date
plainFields.description: Expected date/time for delivery completion.

plainFields.name: start_time
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this delivery stage started.

plainFields.name: end_time
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this delivery stage ended.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this delivery record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this delivery record was last updated.

models.name: shopping_mall_coupons
models.description: Business coupons issued in the shopping mall system for discounts and promotions. These represent master records defining coupon properties, issuance conditions, usage limits, validity periods, and channel restrictions. Coupons are managed independently and drive promotional campaigns across multiple channels and products.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged channel's {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

plainFields.name: coupon_code
plainFields.description: Unique code identifier for the coupon.

plainFields.name: coupon_name
plainFields.description: Name of the coupon for display purposes.

plainFields.name: coupon_description
plainFields.description: Detailed descriptive information about the coupon's purpose.

plainFields.name: discount_type
plainFields.description: Type of discount (amount, percentage).

plainFields.name: discount_value
plainFields.description: Value of the discount either as amount or percentage.

plainFields.name: max_discount_amount
plainFields.description: Maximum discount amount allowed for this coupon.

plainFields.name: min_order_amount
plainFields.description: Minimum order amount required to apply this coupon.

plainFields.name: usage_limit
plainFields.description: Maximum number of times this coupon can be used across all customers.

plainFields.name: per_customer_limit
plainFields.description: Maximum number of times this coupon can be used by one customer.

plainFields.name: start_date
plainFields.description: Start date and time of coupon validity period.

plainFields.name: end_date
plainFields.description: End date and time of coupon validity period.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Status of the coupon, e.g. active, paused, expired.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_coupon_conditions
models.description: Conditions specifying the applicability and constraints of coupons. These subsidiary entries control which products, sections, or categories a coupon can be applied to, including inclusion or exclusion rules. Managed through coupon entity lifecycle.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_coupon_id
foreignFields.description: Related coupon's {@link shopping_mall_coupons.id}.

plainFields.name: condition_type
plainFields.description: Type of condition (include, exclude, etc.).

plainFields.name: product_id
plainFields.description: Target product's {@link shopping_mall_sales.id}, nullable if condition relates to other dimension.

plainFields.name: section_id
plainFields.description: Target section's {@link shopping_mall_sections.id}, nullable if condition relates to other dimension.

plainFields.name: category_id
plainFields.description: Target category's {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}, nullable if condition relates to other dimension.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_coupon_tickets
models.description: Individual coupon ticket records assigned to customers. These represent issued coupon instances with their own validity, usage status, and linkage to customers and coupons. Tickets enable tracking of coupon usage per customer independent of the global coupon usage.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_coupon_id
foreignFields.description: Associated coupon's {@link shopping_mall_coupons.id}.

foreignFields.name: guestuser_id
foreignFields.description: Owner guest user's {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}, nullable for member/seller/admin ownership.

foreignFields.name: memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Owner member user's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, nullable for guest/seller/admin ownership.

foreignFields.name: selleruser_id
foreignFields.description: Owner seller user's {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}, nullable for guest/member/admin ownership.

foreignFields.name: adminuser_id
foreignFields.description: Owner admin user's {@link shopping_mall_adminusers.id}, nullable for guest/member/seller ownership.

plainFields.name: ticket_code
plainFields.description: Unique code for this coupon ticket.

plainFields.name: valid_from
plainFields.description: Start datetime for the ticket's validity.

plainFields.name: valid_until
plainFields.description: End datetime for the ticket validity.

plainFields.name: usage_status
plainFields.description: Current usage status of the ticket (unused, used, expired).

plainFields.name: used_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when ticket was used, nullable if unused.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_deposits
models.description: Deposit records representing monetary value held in customer deposit accounts. Includes metadata about the deposit period, usage, and related customers (guests or members). These records track deposit lifecycle and balance management.

foreignFields.name: guestuser_id
foreignFields.description: Linked guest user's {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}, nullable for member owners.

foreignFields.name: memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Linked member user's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, nullable for guest owners.

plainFields.name: deposit_amount
plainFields.description: Total deposit amount held in the account.

plainFields.name: usable_balance
plainFields.description: Current usable balance for transactions.

plainFields.name: deposit_start_at
plainFields.description: Start datetime of deposit validity period.

plainFields.name: deposit_end_at
plainFields.description: End datetime of deposit validity period.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_deposit_charges
models.description: Records of deposit charging applications including payment details, status, and audit trails. Tracks the lifecycle of deposit charging operations including approval, cancellation, and failure for guests and members.

foreignFields.name: guestuser_id
foreignFields.description: Linked guest user's {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}, nullable for member owners.

foreignFields.name: memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Linked member user's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, nullable for guest owners.

plainFields.name: charge_amount
plainFields.description: Amount requested for deposit charging.

plainFields.name: charge_status
plainFields.description: Current status of the charge (pending, approved, cancelled, failed).

plainFields.name: payment_provider
plainFields.description: Name of the payment provider used.

plainFields.name: payment_account
plainFields.description: Payment account or reference identifier.

plainFields.name: paid_at
plainFields.description: Datetime when payment was completed, nullable if unpaid.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_mileages
models.description: Mileage point records recording earning and usage for customers. Tracks mileage balances and usage history linked to guests and members.

foreignFields.name: guestuser_id
foreignFields.description: Guest user owner {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}, nullable for member owners.

foreignFields.name: memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Member user owner {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, nullable for guest owners.

plainFields.name: mileage_balance
plainFields.description: Current mileage point balance.

plainFields.name: mileage_income
plainFields.description: Total mileage income points.

plainFields.name: mileage_outcome
plainFields.description: Total mileage used points.

plainFields.name: mileage_expired
plainFields.description: Mileage points expired and deducted.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_mileage_donations
models.description: Mileage donations made by administrators to customers as promotional campaign bonuses or compensation. Records reason, amount, and donation metadata for audit and reporting.

foreignFields.name: adminuser_id
foreignFields.description: Admin user donor {@link shopping_mall_adminusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Member user beneficiary {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

plainFields.name: donation_reason
plainFields.description: Reason for the mileage donation.

plainFields.name: donation_amount
plainFields.description: Amount of mileage donated.

plainFields.name: donation_date
plainFields.description: Date and time of the donation.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Record last update timestamp.

models.name: shopping_mall_inquiries
models.description: Customer product inquiries capturing questions and messages related to products. Supports hierarchical categorization, private posts, and visibility controls. Linked to members or guests and associated with channels, sections, and categories for multi-channel management. Tracks seller responses and inquiry status for workflow management.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Associated shopping mall sales channel. {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_section_id
foreignFields.description: Associated mall section within channel. {@link shopping_mall_sections.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Category classification of inquiry. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuserid
foreignFields.description: Member user who posted the inquiry, if authenticated. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_guestuserid
foreignFields.description: Guest user who posted the inquiry, if unauthenticated. {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: parent_inquiry_id
foreignFields.description: Parent inquiry for hierarchical threading. {@link shopping_mall_inquiries.id}.

plainFields.name: inquiry_title
plainFields.description: Title of the inquiry provided by the customer.

plainFields.name: inquiry_body
plainFields.description: Detailed message or question content of the inquiry.

plainFields.name: is_private
plainFields.description: Whether the inquiry is private and viewable only by authorized roles.

plainFields.name: is_answered
plainFields.description: Flag indicating if the inquiry has been answered by a seller or admin.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the inquiry (e.g., 'open', 'closed', 'pending').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if inquiry is logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_reviews
models.description: Product reviews submitted by customers, linked to purchase history for verification. Supports rating, detailed feedback, privacy settings, and status tracking. Reviews are tied to channels, categories, and members. Historical modification tracking through created_at and updated_at timestamps.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_channel_id
foreignFields.description: Channel through which the review was submitted. {@link shopping_mall_channels.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_category_id
foreignFields.description: Category classification of the reviewed product. {@link shopping_mall_categories.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuserid
foreignFields.description: Member user who submitted the review. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Link to product snapshot representing the purchased product. {@link shopping_mall_sale_snapshots.id}.

plainFields.name: review_title
plainFields.description: Title of the product review.

plainFields.name: review_body
plainFields.description: Detailed review content provided by the customer.

plainFields.name: rating
plainFields.description: Numerical rating value given by the customer, usually 1-5.

plainFields.name: is_private
plainFields.description: Indicates if the review is private and restricted in visibility.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the review (e.g., 'approved', 'pending', 'rejected').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the review was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the review was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp, if review is logically deleted.

models.name: shopping_mall_comments
models.description: Comments made on inquiries and reviews to support interactive customer communications. Includes hierarchical reply support, author identification (members, guests, or sellers), privacy flags, and status tracking. Comments link to parent posts and support logical deletion with audit timestamps.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inquiry_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced inquiry for this comment. {@link shopping_mall_inquiries.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced review for this comment. {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuserid
foreignFields.description: Member user who made the comment. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_guestuserid
foreignFields.description: Guest user who made the comment. {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_selleruserid
foreignFields.description: Seller user who made the comment if applicable. {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: parent_comment_id
foreignFields.description: Parent comment for nested replies. {@link shopping_mall_comments.id}.

plainFields.name: comment_body
plainFields.description: Content of the comment message.

plainFields.name: is_private
plainFields.description: Indicates if the comment is private.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the comment (e.g., 'visible', 'hidden', 'deleted').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the comment was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the comment was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for logical deletion of the comment.

models.name: shopping_mall_seller_responses
models.description: Official seller responses to customer inquiries or reviews. Supports status tracking, visibility control, and logical deletion. Linked to the seller user who authored the response and the related inquiry or review. Enables clear communication between sellers and customers.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inquiry_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the inquiry this response addresses. {@link shopping_mall_inquiries.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_review_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the review this response addresses. {@link shopping_mall_reviews.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_selleruserid
foreignFields.description: Seller user who authored the response. {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}.

plainFields.name: response_body
plainFields.description: Content of the seller's response message.

plainFields.name: is_private
plainFields.description: Indicates if the response is private and not publicly visible.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the response (e.g., 'published', 'draft', 'deleted').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the response was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the response was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp for logical deletion of the response.

models.name: shopping_mall_favorite_products
models.description: Stores customer's favorite products by referencing the member user and the product snapshot at the time of favoriting. Supports soft deletion with logical deletion timestamp and maintains creation/update audit timestamps. Ensures uniqueness of favorite by member and product snapshot.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged customer's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_sale_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced product snapshot at the time of favoriting {@link shopping_mall_sale_snapshots.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Favorite creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Favorite last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Favorite logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_favorite_inquiries
models.description: Manages customer's favorite inquiries by linking to member users and inquiry snapshots. Tracks creation, update, and logical deletion times for proper auditing and personalized data management. Enforces unique favorite entry per member and inquiry snapshot combination.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged customer's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_inquiry_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced inquiry snapshot at favoriting time {@link shopping_mall_snapshots.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Favorite inquiry creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Favorite inquiry last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_favorite_addresses
models.description: Stores customer's favorite shipping addresses by referencing member users and address snapshots. Maintains timestamps for creation, updates, and logical deletion for soft delete capability. Enforces uniqueness of favorite addresses per member and snapshot pair.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_memberuser_id
foreignFields.description: Belonged customer's {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_snapshot_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced address snapshot at the time of favoriting {@link shopping_mall_snapshots.id}.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Favorite address creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Favorite address last update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

models.name: shopping_mall_snapshots
models.description: Stores immutable historical snapshots of various shopping mall entities to preserve the state at specific points in time for audit, rollback, and compliance purposes.

plainFields.name: entity_type
plainFields.description: Specifies the type of the entity being snapshotted (such as 'order', 'product').

plainFields.name: entity_id
plainFields.description: References the unique identifier of the entity instance the snapshot belongs to.

plainFields.name: snapshot_data
plainFields.description: JSON string containing the complete snapshot data of the entity state.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: The timestamp when this snapshot was created.

models.name: shopping_mall_order_audit_logs
models.description: Captures detailed audit trails for order-related events, recording actions performed by users or system processes for traceability and accountability.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Referenced order ID. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: UUID of the user who performed the action, if applicable. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}, or {@link shopping_mall_adminusers.id}

plainFields.name: action
plainFields.description: Description of the action performed on the order.

plainFields.name: action_details
plainFields.description: Additional JSON or text details about the action.

plainFields.name: performed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the action was performed.

models.name: shopping_mall_inventory_audit
models.description: Records inventory changes with detailed information about stock adjustments and actors responsible for the changes to maintain stock consistency and audit compliance.

foreignFields.name: inventory_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the inventory item changed. {@link shopping_mall_inventory.id}

foreignFields.name: actor_user_id
foreignFields.description: User or system actor who caused the inventory change. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id}, {@link shopping_mall_sellerusers.id}, or {@link shopping_mall_adminusers.id}

plainFields.name: change_type
plainFields.description: Type of inventory change such as 'addition', 'subtraction', or 'adjustment'.

plainFields.name: quantity_changed
plainFields.description: Quantity by which the inventory changed; positive or negative.

plainFields.name: change_reason
plainFields.description: Optional textual reason for the inventory change.

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the inventory change was recorded.

models.name: shopping_mall_coupon_logs
models.description: Logs coupon-related activities, including issuance, redemption, and expiration events to support compliance and analytics.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_coupon_ticket_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the issued coupon ticket. {@link shopping_mall_coupon_tickets.id}

foreignFields.name: used_by_customer_id
foreignFields.description: Customer who used the coupon, if applicable. {@link shopping_mall_memberusers.id} or {@link shopping_mall_guestusers.id}

plainFields.name: log_type
plainFields.description: Type of log entry such as 'issuance', 'usage', or 'expiry'.

plainFields.name: log_data
plainFields.description: Additional log information in JSON or textual format.

plainFields.name: logged_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the log entry was created.

models.name: shopping_mall_order_status_histories
models.description: Tracks the history of order status changes, including old and new status with timestamps for monitoring order progress and auditing.

foreignFields.name: shopping_mall_order_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the order. {@link shopping_mall_orders.id}

plainFields.name: old_status
plainFields.description: Order status before transition.

plainFields.name: new_status
plainFields.description: Order status after transition.

plainFields.name: changed_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the status change occurred.

models.name: shopping_mall_ai_recommendations
models.description: AI-powered personalized product recommendations for shopping mall customers. Stores recommendation data generated by AI models to enhance user shopping experience through tailored product suggestions. Each record includes user context, recommendation type, algorithm details, recommendation payload, status, and timestamps.

plainFields.name: user_id
plainFields.description: Reference to the member customer receiving the recommendation.

plainFields.name: recommendation_type
plainFields.description: Type/category of recommendation (e.g., 'personal', 'trending', 'category_top').

plainFields.name: algorithm_version
plainFields.description: Version identifier of the AI algorithm that generated this recommendation.

plainFields.name: payload
plainFields.description: Serialized JSON payload containing recommended product IDs and metadata.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the recommendation record ('active', 'archived', etc.).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last record update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if record is active.

models.name: shopping_mall_fraud_detections
models.description: Tracks suspicious activities detected by AI fraud detection systems within the shopping mall platform. Enables auditing and investigation of potential security incidents to enhance platform trust and user safety. Records include customer and order references, detection types, confidence levels, resolutions, and timestamps.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the member customer associated with the fraud detection event.

foreignFields.name: order_id
foreignFields.description: Related order suspected of fraud, nullable if not order-specific.

plainFields.name: detection_type
plainFields.description: Type/category of fraud detection (e.g., 'payment_fraud', 'account_takeover').

plainFields.name: confidence_score
plainFields.description: Confidence score of AI detection between 0.0 and 1.0.

plainFields.name: resolution_status
plainFields.description: Resolution status of the fraud case ('pending', 'investigating', 'resolved', 'dismissed').

plainFields.name: details
plainFields.description: Detailed description or notes about the fraud detection event.

plainFields.name: detected_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the fraud detection occurred.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last record update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if record is active.

models.name: shopping_mall_dynamic_pricing
models.description: Dynamic pricing records capturing price adjustments driven by AI algorithms for products in the shopping mall. Supports business strategies for price optimization, seasonal discounts, and personalized pricing. Each record references product identifiers, pricing rules, adjustment values, algorithm versions, and status with timestamps.

plainFields.name: product_id
plainFields.description: Reference to the product affected by dynamic pricing.

plainFields.name: pricing_rule_id
plainFields.description: ID of the pricing rule applied for the adjustment.

plainFields.name: adjusted_price
plainFields.description: The new price after applying the dynamic pricing adjustment.

plainFields.name: algorithm_version
plainFields.description: Version of the AI algorithm that computed this price adjustment.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the pricing record (e.g. 'active' or 'inactive').

plainFields.name: effective_from
plainFields.description: Date and time when the dynamic price becomes effective.

plainFields.name: effective_to
plainFields.description: Date and time after which the price is no longer effective.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last record update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp if record is deleted logically.

models.name: shopping_mall_sentiment_analysis
models.description: Stores AI-analyzed customer sentiment data derived from product reviews, inquiries, and other text inputs within the shopping mall system. Facilitates sentiment tracking over time per product and aggregated insights to improve business decisions. Records include references to product and user, sentiment scores, categories, and timestamps.

foreignFields.name: product_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the product analyzed.

foreignFields.name: user_id
foreignFields.description: Reference to the user who authored the sentiment data; nullable if anonymous.

plainFields.name: sentiment_score
plainFields.description: Sentiment score calculated by AI model, typically ranging from -1 (negative) to +1 (positive).

plainFields.name: sentiment_category
plainFields.description: Category of sentiment such as 'positive', 'neutral', or 'negative'.

plainFields.name: source_text
plainFields.description: Original text analyzed for sentiment.

plainFields.name: analysis_date
plainFields.description: Date and time when the sentiment analysis was performed.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last record update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if record is active.

models.name: shopping_mall_analytics_dashboards
models.description: Contains configurations and execution logs of analytics dashboards providing real-time insights for the shopping mall business performance. Records dashboard types, filter settings, last execution timestamps, and related metadata to support dashboard refresh and access control.

plainFields.name: dashboard_type
plainFields.description: Type/category of the analytics dashboard (e.g., 'sales_overview', 'customer_segmentation').

plainFields.name: configuration
plainFields.description: Serialized JSON string of dashboard filter and setting configurations.

plainFields.name: last_run_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the dashboard was last executed or refreshed.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current operational status of the dashboard (e.g., 'active', 'inactive', 'error').

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Record creation timestamp.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Last record update timestamp.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft deletion timestamp if the record is logically deleted.
